body_html:
So. I repeat it on another windows 10 machine with GTX 1060 3GB and core i7 with cuda 9.1 and cuDNN 7.1.1 and whl version if tensorflow from here https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel as before.
(fresh build, 1.6.0, with gpu, SSE2 instructions) and got the same behavior.

So I think it is totally bag with this version of tensorflow and this setup of CUDA\cuDNN

body:
So. I repeat it on another windows 10 machine with GTX 1060 3GB and core i7 with cuda 9.1 and cuDNN 7.1.1 and whl version if tensorflow from here https://github.com/fo40225/tensorflow-windows-wheel as before. 
(fresh build, 1.6.0, with gpu, SSE2 instructions) and got the same behavior. 

So I think it is totally bag with this version of tensorflow and this setup of CUDA\cuDNN
